mode.docs:
Defines the operating mode the PSRAM should utilize. One of `quad` or `octal`.

*See also: [PSRAM](https://esphome.io/components/psram.html#configuration-variables)*

speed.docs:
**int**: The speed at which the PSRAM should operate. One of `40MHz`, `80MHz` or `120MHz`. Note that `80MHz` and `120MHz` are not supported on all modules; in addition, `120MHz` is considered “experimental” at the time this document was written.

*See also: [PSRAM](https://esphome.io/components/psram.html#configuration-variables)*
